item.title: Street light still not fixed, 4th September
item.description:

item.title: Yea so one of our neighbours put their rubbish in the bin near our house, 4th September
item.description:
I wouldn't normally make a big deal but they put black bags and food waste in the blue bin. When I was trying to clean it I saw mail from our neighbours (Waterside Close). I can show video evidence if you need it. The two white bags at the bottom is from number 43. (Ours) but that's it. There is also a blue bag not ours.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waterside Close, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
